attributes.action: arrange an annual house party at buckingham palace and allow entry to all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its about time this house had an awesome house party for all. We (the public) pay to keep it running..dont see the royal family having jobs to pay for necessities.

Get it done....it would be awesome!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
